summary: This bill, the Family Farm and Small Business Exemption Act, aims to exempt family farms and small businesses from being considered assets when determining eligibility for federal student aid under Title IV of the Higher Education Act of 1965. It amends the Act to exclude the net value of family farms (where the family resides) and small businesses (with up to 100 employees, owned and controlled by the family) from the asset calculation. This change applies to need analysis for award years starting on or after the bill's enactment.
